metaDescription: Short guide so you stop feeding and help me carry you: ganks, objectives, and how not to be dead weight.
heroTitle: How to play with me without me going AFK üíö
heroLead: To coordinate better, play with less chaos, and close games before I break my keyboard. My focus: tempo, consistent farming and plays that aren't suicide.
heroNote: Golden rule: if we align waves, vision and tempo, even a 0/10 Yasuo can win.
heroMediaAlt: Top-down MOBA map in green tones
styleIntro: This explains why I sometimes say ‚Äúbad timing‚Äù and why ignoring your pings usually wins games.
styleCard1Text: I prioritize camps because gold doesn't fall from the sky (nor from your free kills).
styleCard2Text: I avoid coinflip ganks: I'm not your babysitter, I look for plays that work.
styleCard3Text: If the enemy gets cocky, lacks vision, or flashes to say hi, I go in.
styleExpectTitle: What you can expect from me
styleExpect2: Answer the enemy with info (or by stealing their jungle).
styleExpect3: Call objectives when it's not mass suicide.
styleExpect4: Help secure vision (if you buy pinks, of course).
styleAvoidTitle: What usually doesn‚Äôt work when asked
styleAvoid1: Ganks with no CC, no wave, and when the enemy is full HP under tower.
styleAvoid2: Fighting objectives when our botlane is shopping for skins.
styleAvoid3: Covering pushes without vision to die holding hands with you.
styleAvoid4: Forcing fights because you're bored (I lose tempo and you lose LP).
gankTitle: Checklist: when is a gank reasonable?
gankIntro: If most are true, I'm coming. If many are missing, better farm and pray.
gankItem1: Enough CC or damage to kill someone (not just scare them).
gankItem2: Enemy overextended or no flash (if they have flash, ping it, I'm not psychic).
gankItem3: Favorable wave so you don't lose more farm than you already have.
gankItem4: Info on enemy jungler: if we don't know where he is, assume he's in the bush.
gankItem5: Doesn‚Äôt break my route: I won't cross the map just to watch you miss the last hit.
gankItem6: Leads to something concrete: tower, dragon, or at least the enemy's dignity.
gankCalloutTitle: How to ask me for a gank (without crying)
gankCalloutCode: ‚ÄúI have CC / no flash / jungler seen bot ‚Äî come and it's free kill‚Äù
gankCalloutHint: With that info I'm running. With 'help jg diff', I mute you.
gankMediaAlt: Lane scene with wards and overextension, MOBA style
objectivesTitle: Objectives: when, how, and what my pings mean
objectivesIntro: An objective isn‚Äôt done ‚Äújust because‚Äù, it's done to win. Let's avoid throwing the game at Baron.
objectivesWhen1: Real priority in lanes (meaning you're not farming under tower).
objectivesWhen2: Enemy jungler far, dead or AFK: clean window.
objectivesWhen3: Waves pushed: if they rotate, they lose tower. Simple math.
objectivesWhen4: Resources available: I have smite, you have ult. Let's use them.
objectivesWhen5: Minimum vision: a pink ward won't make you poor.
objectivesWhenNote: If 2+ are missing, better farm and don't die (hard, I know).
objectivesPingTitle: What it means when I ping an objective
objectivesPing1: I have route/tempo to do it NOW.
objectivesPing3: Place a ward, for the love of God.
objectivesPing4: If you can‚Äôt come, ping ‚Äúno‚Äù and don't suicide trying to get there.
objectivesPingMini: Best response: Move your champion towards the objective.
protocolDuring1: Hit the dragon, not the full HP tank
protocolDuring3: Save CC in case they try to steal
protocolAfter2: Don't stay with 200 HP stealing jungle
protocolAfter3: Invade only if you can count to 5
protocolWarningText: If it's a coin toss, I'd rather leave. My KDA and mental health will thank me.
objectivesMediaAlt: Dragon/Baron area with wards, MOBA style
rolesTitle: How to help me and not be dead weight
rolesIntro: Simple instructions so each role does the bare minimum.
roleTopEarly1: Manage wave. If you're pushed 24/7, don't cry if you get camped.
roleTopEarly2: Ward. The trinket is free, use it.
roleTopMid1: TP for objectives. Don't use it to get back to lane to farm 3 minions.
roleTopMid2: If winning, draw pressure. If losing, stop feeding.
roleTopLate1: Splitpush with vision. If you die alone min 40, it's GG.
roleTopLate2: If 3 come for you, laugh and stall. We win the map.
roleMidEarly1: Help me with scuttle. It's free XP.
roleMidEarly2: If your laner disappears, PING. Don't wait for him to kill bot.
roleMidMid1: Rotate. You are not a static turret.
roleMidMid2: Mid prio = open map. Push and move.
roleMidLate1: Don't facecheck bushes without vision, you're not immortal.
roleMidLate2: Your presence is scary. Use it.
roleAdcEarly2: If support roams, play safe. Don't gift kills for a minion.
roleAdcMid1: On dragon: Hit the dragon. Stop chasing the kill.
roleAdcMid2: Farming is important, but winning the TF is more.
roleAdcLate1: Don't jungle alone. You are a bag of gold with legs.
roleSupportEarly1: Pinks. Buy Pinks. They are life.
roleSupportEarly2: If your ADC is bad, roam mid. Sometimes you have to abandon ship.
roleSupportMid1: Clear vision before objectives. Don't let them see a thing.
roleSupportMid2: If we can't fight, get us out. You are the responsible adult.
roleSupportLate1: Peel for the ADC (even if you hate him).
roleSupportLate2: Your engage wins games. Don't miss it.
roleSupportMediaAlt: Support illustration with vision and wards, MOBA style
closeIntro: So we can go to sleep early or play another one without tilt.
closeRule1: Kills ‚Üí Tower or Objective. Not base, not jungle.
closeRule2: Reset together. Don't go one by one like in a horror movie.
closeRule3: Baron is not started if the enemy jungler is alive and near.
closeRule4: If we don't know what to do, grouping usually works.
closeFinalText: If we do things right, we win easy. If not, at least don't blame me. Play with your brain, please.
closeFinalMuted: I bring the Smite; you bring the neurons. ü§ù
